result.confirmationDetails:
# Confirmation:

­ You will        receive a confirmation email and voucher instantly after booking
­ In the event        that you do not receive an email from us, please check your Spam folder or notify us        via email

# Additional Information:

­ Child        Ticket: Age 3­11
­ Adult Ticket: Age 12­64
­ Senior Ticket: Age        65+

# Insider Tips:
 
­ You can get a fastpass at certain        attractions and skip the lines!
­ For the best discount at Hong Kong Disneyland        restaurants, this great value [meal    voucher](http://www.klook.com/activity/524­disneyland­gourmet­meal­voucher­hong­kong/?neighborhood=4) (not included) gets you one meal and beverage!
­ For the utmostcomfort and convenience, book your [Hong Kong Disneylandtransfers](https://www.klook.com/activity/802­disneyland­transfers­hong­kong/)
Check out this [handy guide](http://www.klook.com/blog/guide­hong­kong­disneyland/)for more Disneyland tips and information
